content:
Students interested in environmentalism and sustainability can apply for OUs Green Week chairperson position until  p.m PERIOD Tuesday PERIOD

Green Week is a weeklong event preceding Earth Day that focuses on teaching students about sustainability said Alice Barrett president of the Student Environmental Council PERIOD

Students can access the application for Green Week chaironline PERIOD

After students submit their applications they can sign up for an interview PERIOD A committee from the Student Environmental Council will interview the applicants and decide on the chairperson said Barrett a letters and sociology sophomore PERIOD

Though applicants arent required to have previous involvement with Green Week students with more experience are encouraged to apply because know more about the details of the event Barrett said PERIOD

Plans for 2015s Green Week are still in the works Barrett said PERIOD

Some of the events in the past have included free bike tuneups an environmental sustainability fair a South Oval farmers market a social responsibility fair a free movie screening and a free yoga session Barrett said PERIOD

We hope to focus on informing students about what they can do to positively affect their environment Barrett said PERIOD

Applications for Green Week vice chairperson will go out soon PERIOD





Robust news organizations like ours generate civic good that informs improves and inspires communities PERIOD For those invested in OU and Norman OU Daily uniquely has

 Free independent local journalism thats routinely honored at collegiate state and national levels

 The citys largest reporting staff largely drawn from one of the nations top journalism colleges

 A veteran advising staff with a mission to build on our legacy as a launching pad for media professionals

Whether in a onetime donation or a recurring pledge please 
CONTRIBUTE TO OUR MISSION PERIOD
title: Applications for Green Week chairperson due Tuesday | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
